All-
	Some years ago there was an article I believe in the JSSUS that  
dealt with the specifics of how a smith applied for and received his  
court titles. I am not talking about the Art and the Sword Vol 7.  
Rather this was a stand alone article that covered the costs, the  
people and the application process at least in the Edo period as I  
remember it.
	If anyone remembers who wrote it or which issue it may have come  
from I would greatly appreciate the point in a right direction.
Thanks,
-t
